org.clafer.ast

Class AstUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.clafer.ast.AstUtil

  • public class AstUtil
extends Object
    Various static utility functions for working with AST.
    Author:
    jimmy

        Parameters:
        clafer - the Clafer
        Returns:
        true if and only if the Clafer is the root, false otherwise

        Returns:

      • getSuperHierarchy

        public static List<AstClafer> getSuperHierarchy(AstClafer clafer)
        Finds the supertype hierarchy of the Clafer. Equivalent to the Haskell code clafer : getSupers clafer.
        Parameters:
        clafer - the Clafer
        Returns:
        the supertype hierarchy

      • isAssignable

        public static boolean isAssignable(AstClafer from,
                   AstClafer to)
        Detects if a set of from is also a set of to.
        Parameters:
        from - the subtype
        to - the supertype
        Returns:
        true if and only if to is a supertype of from, false otherwise

      • hasNonEmptyIntersectionType

        public static boolean hasNonEmptyIntersectionType(AstClafer t1,
                                  AstClafer t2)
        Detects if a set of t1 can share elements with a set of t2.
        Parameters:
        t1 - first type
        t2 - second type
        Returns:
        true if and only if the first and second type intersect, false otherwise

      • isUnionType

        public static boolean isUnionType(AstClafer union,
                  AstClafer[] partitions)
        Detects if the union type is fully covered by the partitions. For example, isUnionType(Animal, Arrays.asList(Primate, Human, Dolphin)) would return true if and only if primates, humans, and dolphins are the only animals. If humans are primates, the result would still hold.
        Parameters:
        union - the union type
        partitions - the partition of the union type
        Returns:
        true if and only if the partitions fully cover the union type, false otherwise

      • getUnionType

        public static AstClafer getUnionType(AstClafer... partitions)
        Finds the lowest common supertype or null if none.
        Parameters:
        partitions - the partitions of the union type
        Returns:
        the lowest common supertype of partitions

      • hasInheritedRef

        public static boolean hasInheritedRef(AstClafer clafer)

      • getInheritedRef

        public static AstRef getInheritedRef(AstClafer clafer)
        Find the reference belonging to the Clafer or the reference it inherited.
        Parameters:
        clafer - the Clafer
        Returns:
        the reference, or null if none exist
